verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that came to <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6602>Pethuel<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2205>this<s%>, you old men, and give <S%H238>ear<s%>, all you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>. Has this been in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, or <S%H518>even<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>?
<S%H5608>Tell<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>it<s%>, and let your sons tell their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>.

That which the <S%H1501>palmerworm<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H697>locust<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%>; and that which the <S%H697>locust<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%>; and that which the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> has <S%H3499>left<s%> has the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

<S%H6974>Awake<s%>, you <S%H7910>drunkards<s%>, and <S%H1058>weep<s%>; and <S%H3213>howl<s%>, all you <S%H8354>drinkers<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, because of the new <S%H6071>wine<s%>; for it is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

For a <S%H1471>nation<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> upon my <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H6099>strong<s%>, and without <S%H4557>number<s%>, whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and he has the cheek <S%H4973>teeth<s%> of a great <S%H3833>lion<s%>.

He has <S%H7760>laid<s%> my <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H8047>waste<s%>, and <S%H7111>barked<s%> my fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>: he has made it <S%H2834>clean<s%> <S%H2834>bare<s%>, and cast it <S%H7993>away<s%>; the <S%H8299>branches<s%> there are made <S%H3835>white<s%>.
<S%H421>Lament<s%> like a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> for the <S%H1167>husband<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

The food <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H8334>ministers<s%>, <S%H56>mourn<s%>.

The <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted<s%>, the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%>; for the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted<s%>: the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, the <S%H3323>oil<s%> <S%H535>languishes<s%>.

Be you <S%H3001>ashamed<s%>, O you <S%H406>husbandmen<s%>; <S%H3213>howl<s%>, O you <S%H3755>vinedressers<s%>, for the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and for the <S%H8184>barley<s%>; because the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%>.

The <S%H1612>vine<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, and the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H535>languishes<s%>; the <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H8558>tree<s%>, the palm tree <S%H8598>also<s%>, and the apple tree, even all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, are <S%H3001>withered<s%>: because <S%H8342>joy<s%> is withered <S%H3001>away<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

<S%H2296>Clothe<s%> <S%H5594>yourselves<s%>, and lament, you <S%H3548>priests<s%>: <S%H3213>howl<s%>, you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: <S%H935>come<s%>, lie all <S%H3885>night<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, you <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>: for the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> is <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>, <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

<S%H162>Alas<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%>! for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand<s%>, and as a <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> shall it <S%H935>come<s%>.
Is not the <S%H400>food<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H8057>Yes<s%>, joy and <S%H1524>gladness<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>?

The <S%H6507>seed<s%> is <S%H5685>rotten<s%> under their <S%H4053>clods<s%>, the <S%H214>garners<s%> are laid <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, the <S%H4460>barns<s%> are broken <S%H2040>down<s%>; for the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H3001>withered<s%>.

How do the <S%H929>animals<s%> <S%H584>groan<s%>! the <S%H5739>herds<s%> of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> are <S%H943>perplexed<s%>, because they have no <S%H4829>pasture<s%>; <S%H5739>Yes<s%>, the flocks of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> are made <S%H816>desolate<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to you will I <S%H7121>cry<s%>: for the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and the <S%H3852>flame<s%> has <S%H3857>burned<s%> all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H6165>cry<s%> also unto <S%H650>you<s%>: for the rivers of <S%H4325>waters<s%> are dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, and the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.
